channel.title: Would you play RSC mudclient 39?
channel.description:
Just asking to see if I should start working on it more or just when I'm bored.
Mud 39 has: No prayer Magic spells only up to 14. You can choose if you pk everywhere or skill. Clientside registration, you're able to choose if you're adventurer wizard etc. Some non-combat skills.
http://rsc39.sytes.net

item.title: Would you play RSC mudclient 39?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:43, topic:389483"][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=485397.msg3576839#msg3576839 date=1303489028]
Vortex, is that edge bank?
[/quote]
Yup, it is edge bank.

EDIT: At the moment I’m using EasyRSC as base for now, and it seems that if server menu action packet like “attack” or “Take” it closes the connection. Is this usual behavior of EasyRSC?[/quote]
No.

Read full topic

item.title: Would you play RSC mudclient 39?
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:40, topic:389483"][quote author=vortex link=topic=485397.msg3576770#msg3576770 date=1303486480]
Does walking in your client/server kinda “lag” like in my version here? http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=169g5mb&s=7
[/quote]
It doesn’t, It works just normal. I’m using all the stuff that were in RSCD in first place. I even modified the client to have playerupdating structure same as in 204.

EDIT: Seems like your client isn’t displaying the walking animation/sprite, have you looked into it yet?

...[/quote]You’re probably right, I’ll take a look at it in a min.

Read full topic

item.title: Would you play RSC mudclient 39?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

vortex:

Does walking in your client/server kinda “lag” like in my version here? http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=169g5mb&s=7

It doesn’t, It works just normal. I’m using all the stuff that were in RSCD in first place. I even modified the client to have playerupdating structure same as in 204.

EDIT: Seems like your client isn’t displaying the walking animation/sprite, have you looked into it yet?

                if(command == 250) {
                    int mobCount = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, 1);
                    int mobUpdateOffset = 3;
                    for(int currentMob = 0; currentMob < mobCount; currentMob++) {
                        int mobArrayIndex = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                        mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                        if(mobArrayIndex < 0 || mobArrayIndex > mobArray.length) {
                        	return;
                        }
                        Mob mob = mobArray[mobArrayIndex];
                        if(mob == null) {
                        	return;
                        }
                        byte mobUpdateType = data[mobUpdateOffset++];
                        if(mobUpdateType == 0)
                        {
                            int j28 = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                            mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                            if(mob != null)
                            {
                                mob.qr = 150;
                                mob.pr = j28;
                            }
                        } else
                        if(mobUpdateType == 1)
                        {
                            byte byte5 = data[mobUpdateOffset];
                            mobUpdateOffset++;
                            if(mob != null)
                            {
                                String s1 = new String(data, mobUpdateOffset, byte5);
                                if(s1.startsWith("@que@"))
                                {
                                    mob.or = 150;
                                    mob.nr = s1;
                                    if(mob == ourPlayer)
                                        displayMessage("@yel@" + mob.name + ": " + mob.nr, 5);
                                } else
                                if(mob != ourPlayer)
                                {
                                    boolean flag2 = false;
                                    for(int j37 = 0; j37 < super.md; j37++)
                                        if(super.nd[j37] == mob.nameLong)
                                            flag2 = true;

                                    if(!flag2)
                                    {
                                        s1 = DataOperations.nm(s1, true);
                                        mob.or = 150;
                                        mob.nr = s1;
                                        displayMessage(mob.name + ": " + mob.nr, 2);
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            mobUpdateOffset += byte5;
                        } else
                        if(mobUpdateType == 2)
                        {
                            int k28 = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                            mobUpdateOffset++;
                            int i32 = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                            mobUpdateOffset++;
                            int i35 = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                            mobUpdateOffset++;
                            if(mob != null)
                            {
                                mob.rr = k28;
                                mob.hitPointsCurrent = i32;
                                mob.hitPointsBase = i35;
                                mob.combatTimer = 200;
                                if(mob == ourPlayer)
                                {
                                    playerStatCurrent[3] = i32;
                                    playerStatBase[3] = i35;
                                }
                            }
                        } else
                        if(mobUpdateType == 3)
                        {
                            int l28 = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                            mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                            int j32 = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                            mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                            if(mob != null)
                            {
                                mob.bs = l28;
                                mob.ds = j32;
                                mob.cs = -1;
                                mob.es = uz;
                            }
                        } else
                        if(mobUpdateType == 4)
                        {
                            int i29 = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                            mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                            int k32 = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                            mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                            if(mob != null)
                            {
                                mob.bs = i29;
                                mob.cs = k32;
                                mob.ds = -1;
                                mob.es = uz;
                            }
                        }
                        if(mobUpdateType == 5) {
                            if(mob != null) {
                                mob.mobIntUnknown = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                                mobUpdateOffset += 2;
                                mob.nameLong = DataOperations.getUnsigned8Bytes(data, mobUpdateOffset);
                                mobUpdateOffset += 8;
                                mob.name = DataOperations.longToString(mob.nameLong);
                                int wornLength = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                                mobUpdateOffset++;
                                for(int i28 = 0; i28 < wornLength; i28++)
                                {
                                    mob.animationCount[i28] = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                                    mobUpdateOffset++;
                                }

                                for(int l31 = wornLength; l31 < 12; l31++)
                                    mob.animationCount[l31] = 0;

                                mob.colourHairType = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.colourTopType = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.colourBottomType = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.colourSkinType = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.pvpSetting = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.level = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                                mob.skulled = data[mobUpdateOffset++] & 0xff;
                            } else {
                                mobUpdateOffset += 14;
                                int k25 = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[mobUpdateOffset]);
                                mobUpdateOffset += k25 + 1;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return;
                }

Read full topic

item.title: Would you play RSC mudclient 39?
item.dc:creator: @Salty_FIsh Salty FIsh
item.description:
@Salty_FIsh wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:19, topic:389483”][quote author=Salty FIsh link=topic=485397.msg3558013#msg3558013 date=1302039966]

[quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=485397.msg3557967#msg3557967 date=1302038161]

Exactly but its a RSC server. The latest client is 224. Most clients you see today in private servers are 204/202. The MC 39 was used by Jagex back in 2001-02ish…if you are wondering the time. So yes a “39”
[/quote]231 actually

How is an RSC server 231 when a 194 is RS2 Beta?
[/quote]Your retarded, RSC was version 201 before rs2 beta was realsed FYI

You’re retarded for even saying that. RSC was 201 before 194? That doesn’t make sense. At least if I don’t understand, explain it properly.[/quote]RS Beta was a private project before putting it to the public… Ofc they themself changed the versions from 0-*** why would they start were rsc finished when there two totally different games? Get back to the rs2 section with you.

Read full topic
